titles.title: How Shall I Follow Him I Serve (familiar tune

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How shall I follow Him I serve How shall I copy Him I love Nor from those blessed Footsteps swerve Which lead me to His seat above{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Privations sorrows bitter scorn The life of toil the mean abode The faithless kiss the crown of thorn Are these the consecrated road{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord should my path Through suff'ring lie Forbid it I should e'er repine Still let me turn to Calvary Nor heed my griefs Remembering Thine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O let me think how Thou didst leave Untasted every pure delight To fast - to faint - to watch - to grieve The toilsome day - the homeless night{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To faint - to grieve - to die for me Thou camest not Thyself to please And dear as earthly comforts be Shall I not love Thee more than these{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes I would count them all but loss To gain the notice of Thine eye Flesh shrinks and trembles at the cross But Thou canst give the victory{/lang-eng}
